article_title: New Drug Effective In Treating Iron Deficiency Anemia In Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease On Dialysis

article_metadata.description: ASN Logo (Photo credit: Wikipedia) Based on early studies, an investigational drug, Triferic, is both effective and well tolerated in treating iron deficiency in patients with chronic kidney disease (CKD) undergoing dialysis. Physicians from the North Shore-LIJ Health System presented late-breaking data about Triferic November 9 at the American Society of [...]
article_metadata.author: Robert Glatter, MD
